channel.title: info-security on Que Le
channel.description: Recent content in info-security on Que Le

item.title: Info Security
item.description: Introduction to information security, covering fundamental concepts and principles, focusing on securing computers and networks. Topics include security basics, risk assessment, software and system security, cryptography, network authentication, malware defense, privacy, and legal and ethical considerations.
